thread.section_title: Hilton Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: My2cents
thread.title_full: My2cents - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Steve E
title: My2cents
text: Great place to stay. We stayed two nights and we're very pleased with our room. Bed was comfortable. Staff was friendly, and check in was a breeze. We got in early and we're able to check our bags, and hit the town. When our room was ready they called us to let us know. I would recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay in Manhattan.
